document_data.name: Kessla
document_data.mainbody: '''Kessla''' was a beautiful [[half-elf]] retired minstrel who ran the [[Red Rock]] inn in [[Dagger Falls]].
document_data.Activities: She was widely believed to be an agent of the [[Harpers]] who served under [[Storm Silverhand]] of [[Shadowdale]].
